name: Theatre of Evolution (Game Lab)
description:
This is the game my team made in Game Lab in the spring of 2017 at UTDallas (after I spent the following summer fixing all the bugs and improving the balance).  It is a hotseat multiplayer turn-based strategy game where each player chooses from one of 3 teams: Golems, Fish, or Plants and attempt to destroy the enemy base by gathering resources to build and support their army.  All the while the creatures evolve to become stronger.  

We are currently working on a remake of this game in Unity.  It will have an Android release and AI players.  I will post a beta when I fell it is ready for testing.  Since were serious about making this into a real game, feedback would be greatly appreciated.
